http://hsivonen.iki.fi/test/moz/en-UK.ht.message: Bad value “en-UK” for attribute “lang” on element “p”: Bad region subtag.

http://hsivonen.iki.fi/test/moz/unescape.message: “&” did not start a character reference. (“&” probably should have been escaped as “&”.)

http://simon.html5.org/test/validator/co.message: Any “input” descendant of a “label” element with a “for” attribute must have an ID value that matches that “for” attribute.
The “label” element may contain at most one “input”, “button”, “select”, or “textarea” descendant.
